General.Name: Kura Sushi Asia Co Ltd
General.Description: Kura Sushi Asia Co., Ltd. operates sushi restaurant in Taiwan. Its restaurants offer sushi, warship, hand scroll, roll, and side meal products, desserts, drinks, and others. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 32, Zhongshan North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
